memberdef.name: COMSB_WAIT_BUSY
memberdef.initializer: 0x40 /* flow controlled off for some other reason */

memberdef.name: COMSEND_LOCAL
memberdef.initializer: 0 /* so callers can call their own handler function without confusion */

memberdef.name: COMSEND_NORMAL
memberdef.initializer: 4 /* Routine call, all data is buffered */
